albums.modalInivteDesc:
If you get invite code, please press
join button and if you want to create new one
press create button

createAlbum.codeDesc: You can check invite code after creating new album. Share code to people who want to make album together.

intro.title: Welcome!

If you have invite code input code and
press join button. if you do not have,
create new album

updateAlbum.codeDesc: Share code to who you want to invite! Press code for copying
